Cấu trúc “是……的 ” dùng để nhấn mạnh thời gian, địa điểm, mục đích, đối tượng,… của hành động đã xảy ra hoặc hoàn thành. Trong câu khẳng định, “是 ” có thể lược bỏ. Trong câu phủ định, “是” không thể lược bỏ
explain.en:
When did you guys know each other?
Last month.
-----------------
The structure “是……的 ” is used to emphasize the time, place, purpose, object, etc. of the action that has taken place or completed. In affirmative sentences, “是 ” can be truncated. In negative sentences, “是” cannot be omitted
explain.ko:
너희들은 언제 서로를 알게 되었니?
지난 달.
-----------------
The structure “是……的 ” is used to emphasize the time, place, purpose, object, etc. of the action that has taken place or completed. In affirmative sentences, “是 ” can be truncated. In negative sentences, “是” cannot be omitted
explain.fr:
Quand vous êtes-vous connus les gars ?
Le mois dernier.
-----------------
The structure “是……的 ” is used to emphasize the time, place, purpose, object, etc. of the action that has taken place or completed. In affirmative sentences, “是 ” can be truncated. In negative sentences, “是” cannot be omitted
explain.ja:
いつあなたたちはお互いを知ったのですか？
先月。
-----------------
